=C2=A0
Hi Tom,

I think there is no such log file that reports all the ex=
tracted links for a specific site.
However, crawl.log file has plethora of =
information and you most likely can 'grep' it as per your requirement.


Al=
so, if you are not aware, the bean "seeds" has=C2=A0 a property "sourceTagS=
eeds" which when set to true will have the originating seed appended to all=
 the extracted links lines of crawl.log

I think this is perhaps what you m=
ay be looking for.

Thanks,
Pranay


________________________________
From:=
 Tom Zeithaml <tom@...>
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tu=
esday, September 27, 2011 3:50 AM
Subject: [archive-crawler] Log all Links
=


=C2=A0
